definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
Vasili Eroshenko (1890-1952), Russian writer and poet who wrote in Esperanto and Japanese

sentences.english: Cosette had emerged from under the table.
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特從桌子底下鑽出來。
妮珂萊特叫醒吉諾曼姨媽。
珂賽特發出一聲淒厲的叫聲。

sentences.english: Cosette crawled out of the sort of hole in which she had hidden herself. The Thenardier resumed
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特從她那藏身洞裏爬出來。

sentences.english: One day Cosette chanced to say "father" to him.
sentences.chinese: 有一天珂賽特脫口叫了他一聲“父親”。

sentences.english: At first, he only remained a few minutes with Cosette, and then went away.
sentences.chinese: 開始時他只和珂賽特在一起待上幾分鐘就走了。

sentences.english: The house in the Rue Plumet being held on a lease, still belonged to Cosette.
sentences.chinese: 卜呂梅街的房子原有租賃契約，現在還屬於珂賽特。

sentences.english: Cosette saw him through the hole in her shutter.
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特能從她的板窗洞裏望見他。

sentences.english: One day he followed Cosette to the Rue de l'Ouest.
sentences.chinese: 一次，他跟着珂賽特到了西街。

sentences.english: Cosette dropped her head, and went for an empty bucket which stood near the chimney-corner.
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特低下了頭，走到壁爐角上取了一隻空桶。

sentences.english: The team will return to India to continue studying Koro in November.
sentences.chinese: 這支探險隊會在十一月份回到印度繼續研究珂珞語。

sentences.english: Only, he thought of Cosette with a pang at his heart.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的心情沉重，想念着珂賽特。

sentences.english: Marius had taken Cosette to his father's grave.
sentences.chinese: 馬呂斯帶珂賽特去上他父親的墳。

sentences.english: Only once did Cosette make a mistake and alarm him.
sentences.chinese: 只有一次，珂賽特失誤了，使他大喫一驚。

sentences.english: Cosette told him what she thought she had heard and seen.
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特把她彷彿聽到的和見到的都講給他聽。

definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
used in the transliteration of people's names
